summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 7 Wonders Nourishing Leave In Conditioner with Pure Organic Oils of Almond, Marula, Argan, Olive, Macadamia, Coconut & Jojoba 16.9 fl. Oz. Review Date: 2019/07/28 Store: Frulatte Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 3.86 x 2.8 inches; 1.23 Pounds'} Review Text: I first found this product at a discount store. And I’m thrilled to find that Amazon has it so I can never be without it! I have waist-length hair that is kinky curly with gray hair throughout that I wear straightened. This product is the only one that keeps my hair from frizzing no matter how hot and humid it gets! And the shine and softness of my hair is the best it’s ever been. I use it after using It’s A Ten Miracle Silk Leave-In after washing my hair with Wen.

Even if you have long hair, use this stuff sparingly and make sure you liquify it in the palms of your hand and between your fingers before you put it through your hair.

Another plus: the huge bottle lasts me about 6 months. Keep in mind my hair is dry so I only wash it twice a week. Knowing that, you can gauge how long this bottle will last you. Review Title: Best Anti-Frizz Hair Product I’ve Ever Used Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FESHFEN Straight Long Ponytail Extensions 24 Inch Wrap Around Synthetic Hair Piece Magic Paste Pony Tail Hair Extensions Hairpieces for Women Girls Review Date: 2019/12/02 Store: FESHFEN Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FESHFEN', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '14.96 x 3.58 x 0.75 inches; 5.19 Ounces'} Review Text: Difficult to get the hair ‘wrap’ wrapped around my own ponytail because the Velcro sticks to the fake hair. Also is too heavy so is slides down your own ponytail. Review Title: Doesn’t stay on! Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YoungSee 20" Remy Tape in Hair Extensions Ombre Balayage Medium Brown with Bleach Blonde 100% Real Human Hair Seamless Tape in Human Hair Extensions 50g 20pcs Review Date: 2020/09/15 Store: YoungSee Average Rating: 1.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YoungSee', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '786784875194'} Review Text: I was so disappointed when I open the package. The top of the Wests are almost black. They are not a medium brown at all. Unfortunately I open the package too late to be able to return them. I’m keeping the box to remind myself never to buy from them again.

UPDATE: They also mat horribly! Review Title: DON’T BUY -Tops are Black,NOT Brown Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: VeSunny 20Inch Balayage Tape in Hair Extensions Remi Human Hair Brazilian Remy Hair Invisible Tape Ombre #4 Dark Brown to Caramel Blonde Mixed Platinum Blonde Human Hair Tape in Extensions 20pc 50g Review Date: 2020/11/20 Store: Ve Sunny Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ve Sunny', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 0.98 x 0.98 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '798863462690'} Review Text: These extensions are NOT Remy! You can’t call this remy hair if the cuticles are not all going in the same direction. And miss-matched cuticles cause matting at the tape. While sitting and watching TV not moving my head, they all matted up at the tape! Now I have to take them all out! Review Title: NOT REMY HAIR-They all may up at the tapes! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Human Hair Extensions Tape in 50g Golden Blonde Highlighted With Light Blonde Tape in Hair Extensions 20 Inches Tape Extensions Review Date: 2020/11/24 Store: RUNATURE Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'RUNATURE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 4.65 x 1.77 inches; 5.36 Ounces'} Review Text: The first set I purchased matted several times a day no matter how often I oiled them. They matted within 10-15 minutes after brushing, even when I sat still and didn’t move my head. I contacted the company, and they were very helpful. They offered to replace the extensions with new ones! Now that’s Customer Service! I look forward to receiving my replacement extensions. Review Title: Great Customer Service! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vario Tape In Human Hair Extensions 7A Silky Straight Skin Weft Human Remy Hair For Fashion Women (22 Inche 60g 20PCS #12P613) Review Date: 2020/12/08 Store: VARIO Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'VARIO', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Product Dimensions': '22 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '610877854301'} Review Text: Beautiful hair, match my color perfectly. Review Title: Beautiful hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: RUNATURE Mini Tape Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 Inch Remy Hair Tape ins Extensions Chestnut Brown Highlighted Blonde Human Hair Tape Extensions Real Hair 20g Review Date: 2021/09/21 Store: RUNATURE Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'RUNATURE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No'} Review Text: Colors are nice, I love the size so I can fill in smaller areas. BUT their tapes don’t stick to each other!! And the defective tape is so stuck onto each weft that it took forever to peel them off so I could put working tapes on them. Very Frustrating!!! Review Title: Tapes Defective! Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had notable successes with certain hair care products, particularly appreciating one leave-in conditioner for effectively reducing frizz and enhancing shine and softness. This product stood out for its ability to manage hair during humid conditions, a significant benefit for someone with longer, curly hair. The user valued the product's ample size for longevity and praised another set of hair extensions for their beautiful color match, which positively impacted their overall satisfaction. Excellent customer service was highlighted in another interaction, where the company promptly addressed issues with quality, reinforcing a positive brand experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user encountered several significant disappointments with hair extensions. Common issues included mismatched colors and the claim of Remy hair not being upheld, leading to matting problems. The difficulty in using a particular ponytail extension due to its heaviness and poor attachment further detracted from the experience. The frustrations were compounded by defective tape on another extension set that made application tedious and time-consuming. Overall, the user expressed regret over specific purchases and indicated that some products resulted in less than satisfactory outcomes.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience reflects a mix of positive and negative outcomes. They enjoyed an effective leave-in conditioner that provided excellent hydration and frizz control, alongside favorable interactions with customer service for defective products. Conversely, several hair extension purchases were marred by quality issues, including color mismatches, matting, and poor adhesion, leading to frustration. Overall, while some products boosted their hair care routine positively, considerable dissatisfaction arose from failed purchases, indicating variability in product reliability and performance.

target_interaction.title: Extremely Thin with Shredded Ends
target_interaction.text: I have been purchasing and wearing this manufacturer’s tape-in extensions for over two years. I have switched to keratin glue ins and wanted the same color. I was thrilled to find the same manufacturer offered my color in keratin glue-ins. They’re staying in and look awesome!
target_interaction.title_meta: RUNATURE Remy U Tip Hair Extensions Golden Blonde Highlight Light Blonde U Tip Real Human Hair Extensions Straight Pre Bonded utips Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 Inch 50g
